content: frankie s knitted stuff homespun monsters this is a fun pattern for using up small amounts 50g or less of handspun yarn or in fact any yarn at all just choose needles to suit the weight of your yarn which will give a firm enough fabric to stop the stuffing showing through my monsters were knitted with yarns ranging from a thin 4 ply to a chunky weight the smallest is 7cm / 3 tall and the biggest 20cm / 8 the body this is knitted flat in one piece and then joined together cast on 16 sts work two row in stocking stitch next row k1 m1 k to last st m1 k1 next row purl repeat the last two row once more 20 sts now work 10 row in stocking stitch next row ssk k to last 2 sts k2tog next row purl next row knit next row purl repeat the last four row once more 16 sts next row ssk k to last 2 sts k2tog next row purl repeat the last two row once more 12 sts work two row in stocking stitch that s half the body done now work the other half next row k1 m1 k to last st m1 k1 next row purl repeat the last two row once more 16 sts next row knit next row purl next row k1 m1 k to last st m1 k1 next row purl repeat these last four row once more 20 sts now work 10 row in stocking stitch next row ssk k to last 2 sts k2tog next row purl repeat these last two row once more 16 sts work two more row in stocking stitch and cast off fold in half join the two side seams stuff and then close the bottom seam feet cast on 8 sts work 4 row in stocking stitch row 5 k1 *m1 k1 repeat from * to end 15 sts row 6 purl row 7 knit row 8 purl row 9 k2 m1 k3 *m1 k2 m1 k3 repeat from * to end 20 sts row 10 purl row 11 *k2tog repeat from * to end 10 sts row 12 purl row 13 *k2tog repeat from * to end 5 sts thread through these 5 stitches and fasten_off sew the sides of the feet together perhaps stuffing lightly and sew them to the body ears cast on 10 sts next row *kf&b repeat from * to end 20 sts next row purl next row knit cast off knitwise fold in half and sew the cast on edge together in the middle of the ear sew the ears to the body arms and hands make two or as many as you fancy cast on 30 sts knit 2 row the hands are worked in short row on the first 5 stitches only there is no need to wrap the stitches when turning ridge 1 k4 turn k4 ridge 2 k3 turn k3 ridge 3 k4 turn k4
